mapper.insert: insert into transfer (transferId, requestDate, startDate, endDate, portfolioId, requesterId, objectId) values (#{transferId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{portfolioId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{requesterId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objectId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update transfer set requestDate = #{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE}, startDate = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, endDate = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, portfolioId = #{portfolioId,jdbcType=CHAR}, requesterId = #{requesterId,jdbcType=CHAR}, objectId = #{objectId,jdbcType=CHAR} where transferId = #{transferId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select transferId, requestDate, startDate, endDate, portfolioId, requesterId, objectId from transfer
